TextView.android:text:
Fluent talking starts with controlled speaking, the goal of this project is creating a platform that can help you speak calm and fluent.
 
We measure the words per minute you talk, a controlled speech produces a steady range of 70-100 words per minutes (WPM). 
Try to breath relaxed and do not rush. Its best to say a few words per breath, so you have some time to prepare your next words. 
There is also a website being developed where you'll be able to follow your progress. This way you can turn practice into habit and see the result. 

The second technique we use is measuring the breaths per minute, we do this with a bluetooth belt, the prototype already works. 
We are still looking for funding of the belt. 
We can almost start distributing them!
